name: What da Yak
description:
What da Yak (pronounce as What the Yak) is an retro 90's action/arcade game inspired by a classic Thai gaint story. Yak in Thai means 鬼 in Japanese. The story in the game is based on memories of old Thai culture related to a giant creature.  This game is designed and developed by Nutthaput Chuasuwan. He is a 4th year student at the Department of Interactive Design and Game Development, College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.

Basic Controller:

  • Arrows Keys - PC Controller
  • Z,X,C - Action
  • Space Bar - Jump

Tool: Unity, Adobe illustrator

Developer & Designer: Nutthaput Chuasuwan

Advisor: Banyapon Poolsawas

Please donate to Project for improve a team to support our work advancing.
